snippet: Candice Childress, a student at Las Vegas Academy of International Studies, Visual and Performing Arts in Nevada, is one of eight high school seniors around the world who are blogging about their college searches.
abstract: Candice Childress, a student at Las Vegas Academy of International Studies, Visual and Performing Arts in Nevada, is one of eight high school seniors around the world who are blogging about their college searches.

headline.main: For a Film Enthusiast, Judging a College By Its Smell
